Instruction: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
In a separate bowl, combine sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add to the milk mixture and stir until combined.
Put 1 teaspoon of oil into each cup of a 12-cup muffin pan.
Place the tin in the preheated oven until the oil is smoking, approximately 5 to 10 minutes. Take it out of the oven and promptly ladle about 1/4 cup of batter into each cup.
Return to the oven and bake for 30 to 35 minutes until the puddings have puffed up and are golden brown. Serve right away.
